item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2010/08/27/alternative-clock-style/#comment-3526">Matthew Reinbold</a>.
I remember when 3D tubes would put heavy load on CPUs (back in the day), I would give specific instructions to not use it on the servers :-)
I might give the Polar Clock screen save a shot, thanks.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Matthew Reinbold.

I remember when 3D tubes would put heavy load on CPUs (back in the day), I would give specific instructions to not use it on the servers ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Matthew Reinbold
item.dc:creator: Matthew Reinbold
item.description: I've been using a screen saver called "Polar Clock 3" for about a year that time in exactly the same way: http://blog.pixelbreaker.com/polarclock I wouldn't want my clocks that way all the time but its sure better than 3d tubes.
item.content:encoded: I’ve been using a screen saver called “Polar Clock 3” for about a year that time in exactly the same way: http://blog.pixelbreaker.com/polarclock I wouldn’t want my clocks that way all the time but its sure better than 3d tubes.
